section.heading: Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
section.text: This chapter modifies, limits, and supersedes the federal Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, approved June 30, 2000 (114 Stat. 464 ; 15 U.S.C. ยง 7001 , et seq.), but does not modify, limit, or supersede section 101(c) of that act, 15 U.S.C. ยง 7001(c) , or authorize electronic delivery of any of the notices described in section 103(b) of that act, 15 U.S.C. ยง 7003(b) .

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 20-215: Section 32 of D.C. Law 20-215 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2016.
